name: A Book of Beasts and Buddies
name_original: A Book of Beasts and Buddies
description:
A Book of Beasts and Buddies is an interactive beastiary of curious creatures for you to befriend. Every page is a miniature choose your own adventure.

A Book of Beasts and Buddies was designed for the A Game By Its Cover (AGBIC) game jam. The premise of the jam was to design a game based upon a previously existing fictitious game cartridge. A Book of Beasts and Buddies was based upon Bestiary Logbook by Patrick Crotty.

The Audio was done by: Myserval, Dreamreader, and Roni Yosko.
